text.jpText: 日々の DownとUp 教科書にのってない 答えさがし
text.enText: Through ups and downs, I'm always searching \nFor answers that school can't teach me

text.jpText: みんなと一歩ずつ
text.enText: But we're all in this together

text.jpText: それは いつか踏みしめる Startとちょっと似てた
text.enText: We're at the start, looking at goals before us\nWe'll reach them someday, little by little

text.jpText: 熱と秘めた思い
text.enText: With all our passions and reserves.

text.jpText: ドキリ 本気 感じて
text.enText: As I feel the tensions rise

text.jpText: ちら見した横顔
text.enText: I sneak a quick look to either side

text.jpText: 止まらないで Friends
text.enText: Never stop being friends

text.jpText: 負けないようなハートを持ってたいから！
text.enText: I want this rivalry to keep pushing me to be my best!

text.jpText: Yes! アコガレだった夢に今
text.enText: Yes! Here comes the moment that we've been dreaming of!

text.jpText: 誰より前へ ひたむき Dash
text.enText: Full speed ahead, \nWon't wait for anyone!

text.jpText: まばたきもできない 一瞬が来たんだよ
text.enText: Don't blink, don't miss a second\nThis is gonna be the day!

text.jpText: 青春だって実感のない 今日だけど
text.enText: Everybody says that this is our time,\nIt doesn't feel real

text.jpText: And More Get Over!
text.enText: But it's not over yet!

text.jpText: 駆け抜けるよ
text.enText: We'll keep moving on

text.jpText: 涙ひかって明日になれ！
text.enText: All those tears are for tomorrow's sake!

text.jpText: アコガレだった夢に今
text.enText: This is the moment that I've been dreaming of...

text.jpText: 誰より前へ ひたむき Dash
text.enText: Full speed ahead, \nWon't wait for anyone!

text.jpText: まばたきもできない 一瞬、焼き付けてーーー
text.enText: Don't blink, don't miss a second\nOf the memories we'll make!

text.jpText: Yes! 青春ってこんなカタチ？ 知ったかも
text.enText: Yes! Maybe this is why they call it our time\nThe chance of a life

text.jpText: And More Get Over!
text.enText: But it's not over yet!

text.jpText: 私たちの涙ひかって明日になれ！
text.enText: Because through it all,\nThe tears we shed are for tomorrow's sake!
